question:
Match the items in List-I with the items in List-II 
                            List-I                                                                       List-II
A. Land allotted to big feudal landlords                          1. Jagirdari System
B. Land allotted to revenue farmers or rent collectors 2. Ryotwari System
C. Land allotted to each peasant with the right              3. Mahalwari 
to sublet,  mortgage, gift, or sell                                           
D. Revenue settlements made at village level                  4. Zamindari System
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation:
1. The system in which Land allotted to a big landlord was called the Jagirdari system.
2. The system in which land allotted to revenue farmers of rent collectors was the Zamindari system.
3. The land allotted to each peasant with the right to sublet, mortgage transfer was called the Ryotwari system.
4. The settlement made at the village level was called the Mahalwari system.
